description: A React functional component named NotesListItem that displays a note with options to edit or delete. It uses a context hook for note actions and renders note details in a styled article element.

methods.name: NoteListItem({ note })
methods.description: React component that renders a single note card with functionality to edit or delete the note.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Function invoked when delete button is clicked; confirms deletion and calls deleteNote if confirmed.
